column4: hi :)  i keep getting a lot of messages like this when trying to apt-get install something...  i have the 'universe multiverse' line uncommented from /etc/apt/sources.list and I'm using breezy --   apache2-mpm-prefork: Depends: apache2-common (= 2.0.54-4ubuntu2) but 2.0.54-5ubuntu2 is to be installed
notice the 4ubuntu2 vs 5ubuntu2 stuff.  how do i remedy that?
what is the deal with all this 5ubuntu2 crap appended to all these apt packages, anyways????????
That means they've experienced ubunut love...
